title: Top 11 most bike friendly cities
name: Top 11 most bike friendly cities
description:
A Map by Mgrivett

The top 11 biker friendly cities of the world

properties.name: #1 Amsterdam
properties.description: Posted by MgrivettKattenburgergracht 41, 1071KN, Amsterdam, NLThis is the number 1 city in the world for biking

properties.name: #10 Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Posted by MgrivettbarcelonaThe city is working hard to keep bicycle growth.

properties.name: #11 Basel, Switzerland
properties.description: Posted by MgrivettPratteln, SwitzerlandIt has many lanes market through out the city

properties.name: #2 Portland
properties.description: Posted by Mgrivett3356 SE Belmont Street, Portland, OR 97214This city underwent and extreme plan to make it a bike friendly city and now it is # 2

properties.name: #3 Copenhagen, Denmark
properties.description: Posted by MgrivettCopenhagenThis place has the most successful community bicycle program in the world.

properties.name: #4 Boulder, Colorado
properties.description: Posted by Mgrivett5500 Flatiron Parkway, Boulder COSchools report that 75% of their students walk or bike to class.

properties.name: #5 Davis, California
properties.description: Posted by MgrivettIt is a small town with over 100 miles of bike lanes.

properties.name: #6 Sandes, Norway
properties.description: Posted by Mgrivett

properties.name: #7 Trondheim, Norway
properties.description: Posted by MgrivettTrondheim, norwayThis is a great place to live but winters can be cold.

properties.name: #8 San Francisco
properties.description: Posted by Mgrivett8 Sixth Street, San Francisco CAEven though this is a hilly place, many ride because of the seasonal weather.

properties.name: #9 Berlin
properties.description: Posted by Mgrivettberlin, germanyIt is the largest city of the top 11 but still big friendly.
